game.name: Sproutmart – Grocery Store Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Run your own grocery store. Stock shelves, scan items at the checkout, and keep the store moving — solo or with friends. Farm, process, and fish for goods to expand what you can sell.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run your own grocery store. Stock shelves, scan items at the checkout, and keep the store moving — solo or with friends. Farm, process, and fish for goods to expand what you can sell.
